level.heading: CONTENTS OF A PERMIT FOR A NON-FIRST AMENDMENT RELATED PARADE, MARCH, RACE,ALK-A-THON OR OTHER SIMILAR ACTIVITY (ยง 24-710)

level.text: A permit for a non-First Amendment activity such as a non-First Amendment related parade, march, race, or walk-a-thon shall contain the following information as relevant:
The date, assembly area, time for assembly, and starting time of the activity;
The specific route plan of the activity;
The number of monitors to be furnished by the activity organizer;
The number and types of animals and vehicles, and the number of bands, other musical units, and sound trucks, if any;
The portion of the street, sidewalk, or other public way that is to be occupied by the activity participants, including the organizer; and the location of reviewing stands, if any;

The number and size of banners, placards, or other devices, consistent with the information filed on the application, and any restrictions concerning the number and size of banners, placards, or other devices;
The disbanding area and time for disbanding; and
Other information that is reasonably necessary for the conduct of the activity and the enforcement of this chapter.
